alert.note: Alert for Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 27 at 3:22AM EST until November 29 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Onondaga county. * WHEN...From 10 AM Tuesday to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall will occur Tuesday afternoon through Tuesday night. The higher snowfall amounts expected to occur in the northern portions of Onondaga County, including Syracuse.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
